mapper.sql: SELECT COUNT(p.paymentRsvCode) AS paymentNumber FROM tbPayment as p INNER JOIN tbRsv AS r ON p.paymentRsvCode = r.rsvCode

SELECT p.paymentCode ,p.paymentRsvCode ,p.paymentRefund ,p.paymentUseMoney ,p.paymentUsePoint ,p.paymentState ,p.paymentStoreId ,r.rsvStartDateTime ,r.rsvEndDateTime ,r.rsvState FROM tbPayment as p INNER JOIN tbRsv AS r ON p.paymentRsvCode = r.rsvCode
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbCalcDaily (calcDStoreCode, calcDay, calcDaySales, calcDaySum, calcDayPoint, calcDayRefund, calcDayRefCommission) VALUES ( {#storeId} , 0 , 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT s.storeCode , s.storeId FROM tbStore AS s
WHERE r.rsvEndDateTime >= #{today} AND r.rsvEndDateTime < DATE_ADD(#{today},INTERVAL 1 day)

SELECT ifnull(p.paymentCode, '총합계') as 'subtotal' ,p.paymentRsvCode ,sum(p.paymentRefund) as 'refundSubtotal' ,sum(p.paymentUseMoney) as 'moneySubtotal' ,sum(p.paymentUsePoint) as 'pointSubtotal' ,count(p.paymentState) as 'countSubtotal' ,p.paymentStoreId ,r.rsvStartDateTime ,r.rsvEndDateTime ,r.rsvState FROM tbPayment as p INNER JOIN tbRsv AS r ON p.paymentRsvCode = r.rsvCode
WHERE r.rsvEndDateTime >= #{today} AND r.rsvEndDateTime < DATE_ADD(#{today},INTERVAL 1 day)
